title: Celine Dion’s “Beauty and the Beast” song is here, and we want this moment to last forever
text:
Celine Dion’s “Beauty and the Beast” song is here, and we want this moment to last forever Disney has been quietly releasing new Beauty and the Beast songs over the past couple of weeks, and they’ve all been absolutely gorgeous. Last Thursday, we got Josh Groban’s “Evermore” . Then on Sunday, Ariana Grande and John Legend’s music video . 
And now we finally get to hear the new Beauty and the Beast Celine Dion song . 
The track is called “How Does A Moment Last Forever” . It was shared with the rest of the Beauty and the Beast soundtrack a couple days ago and it’s one of three totally new, totally original songs from the movie. 
But it’s not the first time Celine’s sung for the Disney film. Remember this?
Dion and Peabo Bryson even won a Grammy back in 1993 for their recording. 

The same way that Dan Stevens is performing Josh Groban’s “Evermore” in the film, Celine’s “How Does A Moment Last Forever” will be sung by Kevin Kline as Belle’s father Maurice as well as by Belle (Emma Watson) herself. Dion’s version will play over the credits with “Evermore” and Grande and Legend’s “Beauty and the Beast.”
No Beauty and the Beast soundtrack is complete without Celine Dion’s vocal stylings. Though she passed the title track mantle over to Ari and John, we’re so glad she found another way to be a part of the album. 
And Celine’s track is seriously gorgeous. Go ahead and listen. 
We can’t wait to see this movie. Just a few more days! 
In the meantime, we’ll be listening to the whole soundtrack on Disney’s Music VEVO channel .
